landing.title: Erica J. Lee
landing.desc: I am an Olin student, a budding software developer, pursuing a degree in engineering with a concentration in computing. I have been exploring Android mobile apps, databases, data structures, as well as intuitive design. My goal is to build better experiences for people and meet their needs. I believe that all engineering starts and ends with people.
